sentences.en: Garrett Breedlove: Not much chance of that unless you curtsy on my face real soon.
sentences.cn: 那可能性不大,除非你在我的脸上真的马上就行屈膝礼.

sentences.en: She bobbed a curtsy to him.
She managed the curtsy without falling although she was less calm than she appeared.
sentences.cn: 她行着屈膝礼,内心波澜并不像她表面所表现的那样平静.

sentences.en: Susan with her basket met Stumpy at the comer of BroadStreet. Susan made curtsy.
sentences.cn: 苏珊提着篮子在宽街的拐角处碰到了斯达姆比, 苏珊行了个屈膝礼.

sentences.en: The ballerina bobbed a curtsy ( to the audience ) before leaving the stage.
sentences.cn: 那个芭蕾舞女演员在下台之前 ( 向观众 ) 行屈膝礼.

sentences.en: We were taught how to curtsy to the Queen.
sentences.cn: 有人教我们如何向女王行屈膝礼。

words.tran_cn: 女人行的鞠躬礼；屈膝礼

trans.tran_en: if a woman curtsies, she bends her knees with one foot in front of the other as a sign of respect for an important person
